address: To get your cashback and participate in the 100 USDN draw, buy USDN on https://waves.exchange/, stake them on the contract and send me your wallet address. The wallet address can be found on the website https://waves.exchange/ in the upper-right corner under your nickname
invalidAddress: The address does not exist or is entered incorrectly. Please try again.
alreadyInUse: You have already entered this promo and regitstered for a cashback and weekly 100 USDN prize draw.
notEnoughMoney: You have not purchased USDN with a card. This is a mandatory condition for participation. Please make sure you purchased USDN, wait a little and try again.
stakeRequired: Your address does not have any staked USDN or there are less than 10 USDN locked in staking. Please make sure you staked USDN, wait a little and try again.
congratulations: You have successfully registered for the Waves.Exchange contest and cashback campaign! You should receive your bonus soon! 100 USDN raffle winners are announced every week! Stay in touch!
alreadyParticipating: You are already registered in the cashback campaign. The next 100 USDN prize draw will happen within a week!
